How It Works

Shuga is a unique currency that never expires!
It can be exchanged for Cash, Vouchers, Gift Cards, Laptops, Tablets and more! 

There are many ways you can collect Shuga!

Shuga Wheel

The more you shop with our partners, the more chances you get to win Shuga and Boosters here!

Winning Shuga High

Exchange your Candies for tickets to play Shuga High. We give out hundreds of thousands of Shuga every week!

Snap Any Receipt

That’s right! Snap any receipt (even non-partners) and you can still receive Shuga!

Shop with our Partners

All Shuga partners offer attractive Shuga rebates. Snap your receipt and Shuga will be credited to you.

Scan Products

Turn your Bluetooth on to receive a welcome splash message. Following which, you can earn Shuga by scanning featured products!

Visit Partner Stores

Walk-in Shuga can be collected at partner stores. Simply open Shuga app with Bluetooth on you will receive Shuga!
